Class Vendor

  • java.lang.Object
    • NPC
      • Vendor

  • public class Vendor
extends NPC
    The Vendor extends NPC and has an additional field for the currency it carries. It will be able to trade items with the player for set amounts of currency.
    Author:
    Kaylee payne

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMoney()
      Returns the amount of money this Vendor has.
      void setMoney(int amount)
      Updates the vendor's money
      Item trade(int price)
      Will return the Item purchesed whent he correct amount of money is given.
      int trade(Item offer)
      Will refund the player the money equal to the value of the Item given.

    • Method Detail

      • getMoney

        public int getMoney()
        Returns the amount of money this Vendor has.
        Returns:
        money The int value of money this Vendor has.

      • setMoney

        public void setMoney(int amount)
        Updates the vendor's money
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount money will change.

      • trade

        public Item trade(int price)
        Will return the Item purchesed whent he correct amount of money is given.
        Parameters:
        price - The value of the Item the player is buying.
        Returns:
        itemPurchased The Item from the Vendor's inventory that was purchssed.

      • trade

        public int trade(Item offer)
        Will refund the player the money equal to the value of the Item given.
        Parameters:
        offer - The Item the player is giving to the Vendor.
        Returns:
        refund The int amount of money that the offer Item is worth.
